snippet: Tibor Varganyi testified in the trial of his former boss, James F. Lomma, over a fatal 2008 crane collapse on the Upper East Side.
abstract: Former New York Crane and Equipment Corp employee Tibor Varganyi testifies in manslaughter trial of his former boss James F Lomma, over fatal 2008 crane collapse on the Upper East Side of Manhattan; paints a grim portrait of the level of expertise at a company maintaining dangerous equipment.
lead_paragraph: Tibor Varganyi testified in the trial of his former boss, James F. Lomma, over a fatal 2008 crane collapse on the Upper East Side.

headline.seo: Before Crane Fell, Worker Couldn’t Measure Key Part
headline.main: Worker Tells Court He Lacked Math to Measure Crane Part
headline.print_headline: Worker Tells Court He Lacked Math to Measure Crane Part
